content.question: Carefully read Sources A through D, including the introductory information for each source. Compose a thesis statement that develops your position on the extent to which an apprenticeship is a viable alternative to attending college. Then, identify two pieces of evidence from two different sources to support your position. Provide brief commentary explaining how each piece of evidence might be used to develop your position.. Source A (Selingo) Source B (Laura’s Story) Source C (Hanushek) Source D (Chart)
